title: Hottest, Hardest, Most Hectic Tour de France Start Ever? ‘It Was Real Carnage’
content:
Soudal-Quick Step DS calls for more fan 'discipline' as peloton reacts to hot, harrowing, history-making Italian stages.

Read the full article at Hottest, Hardest, Most Hectic Tour de France Start Ever? ‘It Was Real Carnage’ on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
